usp.ime.gclib

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • usp.ime.gclib.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to identify each device in application. If the application doesn't specify the attributes, the default values will be set.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Renato Avila e Tonny Cordeiro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
